titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Connecticut State Library staff.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Paul E. Baran on April 15, 2009

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Manuscript items originally filed in the History & Genealogy Reading Room but transferred to the Archives between 1990 and 1994.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Includes Bible records, correspondence, typescripts and manuscripts.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Special Genealogical File in the History and Genealogy reading room.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Box 10 is stored at an off-site facility and therefore may not be available on a same-day basis.

altformavail.head: Alternative Form Available
altformavail.p: Data found on items in RG 074:054 is indexed and transcribed. See . However, RG 074:054 may also contain material not indexed and transcribed. Researchers should consult all sources.

scopecontent.p: See family names listed under Index Terms for individual family names.
Contents: Guilford; New Hartford; Rehoboth; Salisbury; Sharon; Southbury; Southington; Tolland; Westbrook; Windsor.

did.unittitle: Lydia Smith, A family register drawn by Lydia Smith at Goshian, Feby 1821
